title: Trigonometry: From Basics to Practical Applications
subject: Trigonometry
description: This quiz guides you through a seamless journey in trigonometry, beginning with fundamental definitions and steadily advancing to more sophisticated applications. By the end, you'll have reinforced your understanding of key trigonometric ratios, values, and identities, and learned how to apply these concepts to solve real-world mathematical problems effectively.

questions.text: What is the definition of the sine function in a right triangle?

answers.text: The ratio of the opposite side to the hypotenuse
The ratio of the adjacent side to the hypotenuse
The ratio of the opposite side to the adjacent side
The ratio of the hypotenuse to the opposite side

questions.text: What is the definition of the cosine function in a right triangle?

answers.text: The ratio of the opposite side to the hypotenuse
The ratio of the adjacent side to the hypotenuse
The ratio of the hypotenuse to the adjacent side
The ratio of the adjacent side to the opposite side
